text.div:
This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/resource-aggregation-mode defines the following codes:

LvlCodeDisplayDefinition
1contained ContainedThe reference is a local reference to a contained resource.
1referenced ReferencedThe reference to a resource that has to be resolved externally to the resource that includes the reference.
2  bundled BundledWhen the resource is in a Bundle, the resource the reference points to will be found in the same bundle as the resource that includes the reference.

name: AggregationMode
title: AggregationMode
description: How resource references can be aggregated.

concept.definition: The reference is a local reference to a contained resource.
The reference to a resource that has to be resolved externally to the resource that includes the reference.
When the resource is in a Bundle, the resource the reference points to will be found in the same bundle as the resource that includes the reference.
